content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. This will prevent errors related to missing items during insertion operations.

### Warnings about full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to continue mining operations without interruption. This will prevent the mining drills from stopping due to full output chests.

### Warnings about no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary raw materials to smelt. This will prevent the furnace from being idle due to a lack of ingredients.
